entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:19 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 1:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: W 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 1:23 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 1:23 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:23 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
